name: Three in One
text: During your opponent's End Phase, if your opponent has more total cards in their hand and field than you have in your hand and field: Special Summon 3 Normal Monsters from your GY. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 3 Monster Cards you control with different original names; Set 1 Spell/Trap from your hand or Deck that mentions the original names of all 3 targets.
